segments.text: Observing this kitchen drawing, I take in the details calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, towel in hand over the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet runs steadily, filling the sink beyond capacity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over the edge onto the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the tile floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her right, stacks of clean dishes sit on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows divided panes and tied-back curtains.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, a path winds through bushes toward a fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the left, cabinet doors hang open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stands on a two-step stool, reaching upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in the jar, the other holds a plate steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly, legs not fully aligned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby has her arm extended toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands attentively, palm open in expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overall setup blends routine with subtle activity.
segments.speaker: PAR
